metadata.synopsis: NOTE: This AD triggers from TWO plaques in the Control Centre. The second one is TOOL_GEN_Plaque_Standing_Bronze_B_010 a068b7b5-ef5c-4e00-b891-214fe28b5765

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Telepathic traffic radiates in waves from this semi-illithid globe, and your tadpole throbs in blissful response. This vile globe fills you with instinctive revulsion.*
